item.description:
Hi Everyone,

I hope everyone is doing well. We will be having a Portuguese Round Table on Tuesdays at John Harvard's Brew House with the exception of weeks with major holidays. This is for all language levels, so even if don't know how to speak but would like to sit in to listen and see if you can pick up a few words that should be fine too. Let me know if you have any questions.

Beijos,

Carolina

group.name: The Boston/Cambridge Portuguese Language Meetup Group

item.name: Portuguese Round Table
